name: Squaring (Mavericks)
description:
A parkour game with a lot of post-processing, groovy music and squares.A and D keys - Left and Right
Space Bar - JumpSo, I finally figured out how to use post-processing! This is probably my best game so far. I personally enjoyed this game a lot while playtesting, but that's just me.  Anyways, have a nice day ahead   

All project assets are available on my github.

https://github.com/MavericksCG/Squaring
